post.body: http://twitpic.com/wu8x - M you read my mind. Last night I was hoping upload a new photo of him. Tnks!Happy B-Day Gorbz!
Oh & look at who i'm following, you'll find 'wb6nah '. We are both Captains.
Oh funny! BTW is he ordained?
Hi Heather. Im a Ham too. N7MFE...
Oh that was freaking hilarious! I'll have to remember that one!
http://twitpic.com/wlgq - The secret corner of your room has been reviled! I alway knew you played with little dolls. ;-)
LOL. Funny.
I spend one of my Xmases in Sydney once. I wondered the streets all alone. Most every thing was closed. Only one pub was open.
Tnks. :-)
http://twitpic.com/w1kw - Humm.. Never tried that. It's dark! I love dark drinks. Save me a sip :-)
New post pending your review. ;-)
RT @jcorn1: Reading about perils of Gift cards, use them soon! -- I received a Outback Steak House G.card and I don't care for the place.
LOL! Ok who posted me on the Sexiest Geeks of 2008? I'm SHOCKED and FLATTERED! http://tinyurl.com/4bxtg3
nap time!
RT @misscupcake: .. find a petrol (gas) station ... Oh funny. Your translating for me. ;-)
Happy Christmas and Merry Holidays everyone! Oh did I goof that up? My dyslexia must be kicking in again. Thanks to all for following me!
RT @hotforwords: My favorite alchohilic drink ;) I like your new spelling of 'alcoholic'. You been drinking some when you twittered this?
RT @misscupcake: i wish i was marilyn monroe. Odd..Why?
RT @misscupcake: ... my secret account lol! ;) LOL Listen here darling. You were exposed the first day you log on the net. ;-)
RT @hotforwords: ...so I won't be able to be with them... >Well if make you feel any better. I'm spending Christmas alone. :-(
